Text: {d}šara₂ nir-ŋal₂ an-na dumu ki\abs aŋ₂ {d}inana\gen lugal-a-ni\dat nam-til₃ {d}šul-gi nita kalag-ga lugal urim₅{ki}-ma lugal an-ub-da limmu₂-ba-ka-še₃ lu₂-{d}nanna dumu šu-er₃-ra dam-gar₃-ke₄ x x
